name: How Many Capitals
description: A Quiz where you have to find the most capitals in row! There are 3 levels of difficulty. You have 3 bonuses : 50/50 that splits the number of possibilities, Shuffle again and Skip the question.

name: Social Animals
tech: MAMP, Php, MySQL, PhpMyAdmin, HTML, Tailwind
description: Social Animals is a pets' social network where pets can post their cutest pictures, like other members' posts, follow users, and event attend events!

name: Time Tracker
description: This chrome extension is a time tracker that tracks the total time spent on each website. When activated it records your browser activity in the chrome storage API. The pop-up allows you to to browse your time spent history by date and gives you some informations about an event on this particular day.

name: CODEV-22
description: A video game created with PICO-8. Try to come back home before codev catches you!
